metadata.name: Momentary
metadata.description:
This artwork depicts memories and visions from childhood in semi-abstract forms. 

6500x6500px 300dpi 

I call this series Sub-vision, which deals with the transformation of the raw mental image, which I see as the first moment of the creative process, into forms that evolve from simple to detailed.

My creative process begins and elaborates on the appeal of the mental image. Just as we see it in our minds, from the simplest creation to the most complex design. We move in the real world accompanied by these mental images.

2022
